It's an honorable, charitable thing to do. It allows me to make the world a better place by allowing others to help themselves.
I am so thankful to be blessed with the prosperity that we have here in the USA. I am not a rich man by American standards, but I can afford to give a little. I want to help others in other countries - I want them to experience some of the blessings that the USA has received.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Christian Gnostic who believes in Chivalry, and I try to live my life accordingly. I help and protect the weak and dis-advantaged. I do not get paid for my work, but I take it more seriously than the job I get paid for...

lender.loan_because: Access to credit is strategic across every human settlement, everywhere. The poor need the money now. The KIVA model manages downside credit risk and currency exposure competently.
lender.occupational_info: Testing how content (what we value) and capital (the proximity of fulfillment resources) conflate to improve the equity of the individual as stakeholder on the planet. Drawing upon capital market practices and wisdom literature as back-story.

lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Ling
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: that is what Jesus would do.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know there are people in the world that were not blessed with what I was blessed with andI feel it is my duty to not only share what I have but also help others, especially those that are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I feel that other people should feel what I feel

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I was in Tanzania last year and was involved with a program that dealt with micrloans. I believe it is extremely important to help those in such situations with a small gesture. What an amazing way to fight global poverty and directly empower someone!!
lender.occupational_info: I help students find programs that they want to take to further their studies. As well, I volunteer with an organization that helps build sustainable communities around the world.

lender.name: Bookworm Service
lender.loan_because: It's needed.
lender.occupational_info:
Why buy books from us? We have a huge inventory of discounted brand new books that includes bestsellers as well as classics. On top of our discounted prices we do not charge a shipping fee. The posted price is all that you will be charged. The only exception is if the orders total is less than $10, then we must charge a $1 handling fee to offset the payment processing fee. One last reason to order books directly from BookwormService.com is that our customers are automatically enrolled in our free rewards program that issues store credit for every purchase made.
Visit BookwormService.com & compare us today. With discounted new books, free shipping, & our free rewards program BookwormService.com is the best deal.
Build your own bookstore...We are adding 100s of books daily, if you do not see the book you need then just contact us & we will add it to our site.
Please email us (readbooks@bookwormservice.com) if there are any questions.
Use the coupon code "Kiva" to receive an additional discount.
thank you,
Bookworm Service

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it supports my personal mission statement of supporting, developing, and inspiring others to live to their highest potential in order to glorify God.
lender.occupational_info: I partner with motivated individuals who want to improve their quality of life. I do this by helping them clear about what they want in their life and working with them to create a plan on how make that happen.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone over the Christmas holidays. My daughter (in the photo with me) gave me a gift certificate & introduced me to Kiva. I love the idea of helping others grow their businesses as my husband & I had one.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but enjoy volunteering my time to the Church and helping the elderly. The hardest I ever worked was when my husband & I ran a small farm and raised horses.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed but yet I know none of it is mine. I am only the guardian of what I have right now. For this reason I know it is important to make sure I am sharing what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business in sales.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: 1) My father was in the UN and I know what it like to be a business person anywhere when the economy is tight. 2) I love the independence of creating my own business and want others to share in that joy as well. 3) I have been working to get my business funded too so Kiva helps with my own business karma while providing the fun and joy of being out-there.
lender.occupational_info: I am developing algal technology that will turn industrial sources of CO2 into fuel for transportation, food for livestock and chemicals for industry. A2BE Carbon Capture is good for the earth and good for its people.

lender.loan_because: we are His hands and feet.

lender.occupational_info: I study computer networks. Specifically I focus on security and privacy in online social networks. That's part of what makes Kiva so interesting to me.

lender.occupational_info: Event Production and Logistics

I think it's a way to give a hand up to someone who needs it, without the baggage that can come with gifts.

lender.loan_because: it's a solid investment.

lender.occupational_info: I currently am in graduate school studying religion. I plan to work for an organization in Texas that works to alleviate poverty or works on social justice issues.

lender.name: Russell

lender.occupational_info: Richly blessed and always thankful for what my God has given me. I only hope the little I give can make a big difference in thier quality of life.

lender.name: Blake

lender.name: Hakim Alford
lender.loan_because: I was recently fired from my job.And was living on the street in the cold for 1month1/2.Until a great guy named Rahtiek took me in.I now currently live in the bookstore.He also paid my way in to Ambit Energy which puts me in a bad position because I will not touch my first three checks.I have nothing but the clothes on my back.and don't want to get into any conflict with him because he is a stranger and I don't want to be in the cold.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Energy business Dicounting people's Energy bills.

lender.name: Emily

lender.occupational_info: I am attending graduate school to study social science research methods.

lender.name: Darren

lender.name: Cullen Chambers
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Perform a variety of editorial duties, such as laying out, indexing, and revising content of written materials, in preparation for final publication. Includes technical elements. Formulates policy; plans, coordinates, and directs editorial activities; and supervises workers who assist in selecting and preparing material for publication in magazines, trade journals, house organs, and related publications. Direct activities of production, circulation, or promotion personnel. Prepare news or public relations releases, special brochures, and similar materials. Represents publication at professional and community functions. Determines theme of issue and gathers related material. Writes or assigns staff members or freelance writers to write articles, reports, editorials, reviews, and other material. Read and evaluates material submitted for publication consideration. Secure graphic material from picture sources and assigns artists and photographers to produce pictures and illustrations. Assigns staff member, or personally interviews individuals and attends gatherings, to obtain items for publication, verify facts, and clarify information. Assign research and other editorial duties to assistants. Confer with executives, department heads, and editorial staff to formulate policy, coordinate department activities, establish production schedules, solve publication problems, and discuss makeup plans and organizational changes. Organize material, plans overall and individual page layouts, and selects type. Mark dummy pages to indicate position and size of printed and graphic material. Review final proofs and approves or makes changes. Review and evaluates work of staff members and makes recommendations and changes. Read copy to detect errors in spelling, punctuation, and syntax. Verify facts, dates, and statistics, using standard reference sources. Rewrite or modify copy to conform to publication's style and editorial policy and mark copy for typesetter, using standard symbols to indicate how type should be set. Read galley and page proofs to detect errors and indicates corrections, using standard proofreading symbols. Confer with authors regarding changes made to manuscript. Select and crop photographs and illustrative materials to conform to space and subject matter requirements. Prepare page layouts to position and space articles and illustrations. Write or rewrite headlines, captions, columns, articles, and stories according to publication requirements. Initiate or reply to correspondence regarding material published or being considered for publication. Read and evaluate submitted manuscripts. Review financial reports and takes appropriate action with respect to costs and revenues. Perform duties of one or more subordinate editors and direct activities of advertising, circulation, or production personnel if developments dictates. Secures, selects, and coordinates publication of manuscripts in book form: reviews submitted manuscript, determines demand based on consumer trends and personal knowledge, and makes recommendations regarding procurement and revision. Confers with author and publication team to arrange purchase and details, such as publication date, royalties, and number of copies to be printed. Coordinate design and production activities. Assign and supervise editorial staff. Contract design and production or personally design and produce book. Prepare indices for books and other publications: reads material to determine which items should be in index. Arrange topical or alphabetical list of index items, according to page or chapter, indicating location of item in text. Classify items of topical interest, and inserts cross references in index to refer reader to related subjects appearing elsewhere in text. Direct activities of clerical staff engaged in typing index, filing subject-cards, and performing related duties. Prepare related items, such as glossaries, bibliographies, and explanatory footnotes, following literary style of manuscript author.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: This is my small way of making a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel at the front desk.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It feels good to my soul.
lender.occupational_info: I operate and maintain a small high rise building.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and met many excellent people that deserve a chance, just as I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer that works with international shipping.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: Partly out of hope something good can happen for me as well, partly just for the joy of helping somebody, partly for the belief that we should all help where we can.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I love the idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a doctor.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Why not? As a Libertarian, I like to demonstrate that people can give without having their arm twisted by the government.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other people because they're people!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher.

lender.name: Jinan
lender.loan_because: I believe in you and in mind over matter.I truely believe a little help can go a long way because as long as there is a will there is a way.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently specializing in Paediatrics a branch of medicine that deals with children from birth till adolescence.I am currently working with children who have cancer and feel I have found my calling in life.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I have been in places where what seems a little to me is a lot to someone else, and I would like to help someone who can use some of my little.
lender.occupational_info: I help lawyers with simple paperwork and day-to-day responsibilities.

lender.name: Marcel T.
lender.loan_because: It gives hope.

lender.name: jose victor
lender.loan_because: Ajuda mutua, ninguem tem a mais que nao necessite de alguem, mesmo que seja o pequeno amor. se o dinheiro nao tem.

lender.name: Neddy
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute a little something back to others in the world struggling to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I educate university students and staff on how to use library resources, such as databases, electronic journals and the catalogue.

lender.name: Isabella
lender.loan_because: This is one of the most proactive way of helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: mostly learning

lender.name: toby w
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way, and Kiva helps me do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit nonfiction books for children. The topics I explore often include world geography and history.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can and (selfishly) I want to see what impact my actions have.
lender.occupational_info: mathematical finance/risk analysis for an insurance company (not really sure if that makes it any clearer...)

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have great respect for anyone who is trying to improve their lot or pursue their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university but I would like to become an entrepreneur in the area of fibercrafts.

lender.name: Soren
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of learning people how to fish, as opposed to giving a fish !
lender.occupational_info: Asset Management - Taking care of Investments

lender.name: Jonny Livesley
lender.loan_because: I've been looking for an intelligent way to help others - helping those that want to help themselves seems to be that!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small music venue helping arrange events, liase with others who want to do the same and ensure the events themselves go smoothly.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: life is not a zero-sum game.

lender.name: KivaDiva
lender.loan_because: I believe the world would be a better place by empowering women.
lender.occupational_info: I'm self employed and work at home.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I believe that moving money around the community does a lot more than hiding it in a sock under the bed. As we have become a global community we are no longer just responsible for those we can see, but also those we can't.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a software engineer so that I can help find a solution to information poverty and aid sustainable development across the world. I also hope to have the chance to teach English at some point...and I always wanted to be a sex ed teacher...

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to need someone to take a chance
lender.occupational_info: I'm unemployed right now but, in the past I worked as an auto parts salesman.

lender.name: Sbastien
lender.loan_because: Everybody has the right to have food, house, heating... and happiness in life ! I give because this makes me proud and give me the feeling that the money I earn with my work is useful !

lender.name: ramsey
lender.loan_because: The need exists.
lender.occupational_info: Health Interest.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can help.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: "I offer you peace. I offer you love. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings. My wisdom flows from the highest Source. I salute that Source in you. Let us work together for unity and peace." ~ Ghandi I too feel to bring peace you first must give of yourself.
lender.occupational_info:
I provide the online readers with insights and informative tools to improve the quality of your life, physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually.
Through our articles and books our intention is to provide the tools you are looking for to assist you along this path of spiritual living.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: While traveling I saw people who just needed a chance. I wanted to help, but didn't know how to make a difference. Then I discovered Kiva. Kiva allows me to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lender.name: Matt and Becky
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and want to share that.
lender.occupational_info: I dress in old clothes so that I can tell and show people how the past worked.

lender.name: MIke
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone have a chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I study literature and computers -- a perfect mix of the old and the new.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am given the opportunity to improve my life. I want other people to have the same chance.

lender.name: Mata
lender.occupation: Writer, artist, games designer, and lecturer

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I like helping people to help themselves and because so many people are trying so hard to better their families lives across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and create online games both for education and fun, for a variety of large clients. I do it because I like to know I'm making children and adults alike smile.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to students in grades 9-12, ages 15-18.

lender.name: Sabrina Group-Andrea
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of women helping women around the world. Women can really make change happen!
lender.occupational_info: I craft and make products to sell so women will donate and help other women around the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I have enough money to survive myself and feel I should be able to help those less able.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain computers and make sure my company can keep trading 24 hours a day.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I think it makes a difference.

lender.name: Lee
lender.occupational_info: I manage the apartment complex so that it continues to be open for people to live.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can help the world.

lender.name: Sarae
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a painter, and I currently work at a restaurante, washing dishes.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance and micro-credit are great ways to actually make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant to the government

lender.name: Bastlynn
lender.loan_because: I really wanted to be a superhero when I grew up.

lender.name: Farn
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public health worker; I help people protect themselves and their families from infectious diseases.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I design and build some of the networks that make up the internet.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: "To do something, however small, to make others happier and better is the highest ambition, the most elevating hope, which can inspire a human being."

lender.name: Alyce
lender.loan_because: Helping others, make the world a better place for us all

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I think the only way to improve the world is from the ground up. Helping individuals will filter upwards and enable greater stability across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist researching space physics. I look at the properties of space outside the Earth's atmosphere using spacecraft and try to understand what we see there. This is vital work for the future of space exploration and technology relying on satellites, such as TV and cell phones.

lender.name: joanna
lender.occupational_info: Experimental video and animation.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs around the world and know that my money is being put to good use.

lender.name: symonds

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide an alternative to receiving loans from financial institutions that are interested in profit.

lender.name: Tina
lender.occupation: assistant to a member of European Parliament

lender.name: Maudit Bloke Freelancing
lender.loan_because: I want people to know the joy of being believed in, and use that as power for their own potential.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles, public relations releases, technical manuals and blog postings for companies.
